Class LinkValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinkValidator

  • public class LinkValidator
extends java.lang.Object
     This class provides methods to check link validations 
 The validations include :
      1. checking if a link is under allowed depth or not 
      2. checking if a link is of allowed type or not

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isAllowedLinkType(Link link)
      This method will check whether a particular type of link is allowed or not LinkType means whether its a link to a css , or js or html or a jpeg etc.
      boolean isLinkVeryDeep(Link link)
      This method will check whether the link to be visited is very deep or not
      boolean isVisitable(Link link)
      This method determines should we visit the given link or not

    • Method Detail

      • isVisitable

        public boolean isVisitable(Link link)
        This method determines should we visit the given link or not
        Parameters:
        link - to be checked
        Returns:
        true if link is visit-able otherwise false

      • isAllowedLinkType

        public boolean isAllowedLinkType(Link link)
        This method will check whether a particular type of link is allowed or not LinkType means whether its a link to a css , or js or html or a jpeg etc. the method will verify it from the configurations properties
        Parameters:
        link - to be verified
        Returns:
        true if the link is allowed , otherwise false

      • isLinkVeryDeep

        public boolean isLinkVeryDeep(Link link)
        This method will check whether the link to be visited is very deep or not
        Parameters:
        Link - to be visited
        Returns:
        true if depth is less than or equals to crawlDepth otherwise false
